tit.cmt: 「まつのお」を「Matsuno」と表示しました。

sen.j: 松尾寺（まつのおでら）は、京都府舞鶴市にある真言宗醍醐派の寺院。
sen.e: Matsunoo-dera Temple is a Buddhist temple in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture belonging to the Daigo branch of the Shingon Sect.
Matsunoo-dera Temple is a Buddhist temple in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture belonging to the Daigo branch of the Shingon Sect.
Matsuno-dera Temple is a Buddhist temple in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture belonging to the Daigo school of the Shingon Sect.
sen.cmt: 「まつのお」を「Matsuno」と表示し、「Daigo branch」→「Daigo school」としました。

sen.j: 西国三十三箇所第29番札所。
sen.e: It is the 29th temple of the 33 Temple Kansai Kannon Pilgrimage.
It is the 29th temple of the 33 Temple Kansai Kannon Pilgrimage.
It is No. 29 pilgrim stamp office of the 33 Temples of Saigoku.
sen.cmt: 「西国三十三箇所」の訳を修正しました。"the 29th of the 33 temples that are visited during the Kansai Kannon Pilgrimage"→"No. 29 pilgrim stamp office of the 33 Temples of Saigoku"に変更しました。

sen.j: 舞鶴市と福井県大飯郡高浜町との境にある青葉山 (京都府・福井県)の山腹に位置する。
sen.e: The temple stands on the side of Mt. Aoba (Kyoto Prefecture/Fukui Prefecture) that lies on the boundary between Maizuru City and Takahama-cho, Ooi County, Fukui Prefecture.
The temple stands on the side of Mt. Aoba (Kyoto Prefecture/Fukui Prefecture) that lies on the boundary between Maizuru City and Takahama-cho, Ooi County, Fukui Prefecture.
The temple stands on the side of Mt. Aoba (Kyoto Prefecture/Fukui Prefecture) that lies on the boundary between Maizuru City and Takahama-cho, Oi-gun, Fukui Prefecture.

sen.j: 毎年5月8日に行われる松尾寺の仏舞は有名。
sen.e: It is famous for the Matsunoo-dera Temple Hotokemai held every August 8th.
It is famous for the Matsunoo-dera Temple Hotokemai held every August 8th.
It is famous for Hotokemai dance of the Matsuno-dera Temple held every May 8.
sen.cmt: 「まつのお」を「Matsuno」、「dance」を補足、「August 8th」→「May 8」としました。

sen.j: 本尊は馬頭観世音菩薩坐像。
sen.e: The principal image is a seated statue of Hayagriva.
The principal image is a seated statue of Hayagriva.
The principal image is a sedentary statue of Hayagriva.
sen.cmt: 他のトピックと表現をあわせ、「sedentary」としました。

sen.e: Color on silk portrait of Samantabhadra
Color on silk portrait of Samantabhadra
Color painting on silk, portrait of Samantabhadra

sen.e: Color on silk portrait of Mahamayuri
Color on silk portrait of Mahamayuri

sen.j: 木造阿弥陀如来坐像 快慶作
sen.e: Wooden seated statue of Amitabha crafted by Kaikei
Wooden seated statue of Amitabha crafted by Kaikei
Wooden sedentary statue of Amitabha crafted by Kaikei

sen.e: Matsuo 532, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture
Matsuo 532, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture
532 Matsuo, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture
Train
Train
Train

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道 小浜線 松尾寺駅 下車で徒歩約40分
sen.e: Approximately 40 minutes walk from Matsunoo Station on the West Japan Railway Company Obama Line.
Approximately 40 minutes walk from Matsunoo Station on the West Japan Railway Company Obama Line.
Approximately 40 minutes walk from Matsunodera Station on Obama Line, the West Japan Railway Company.
Bicycle
Bicycle
Car

sen.j: 国道27号の福井県との府県境にほど近いところから京都府道564号松尾吉坂線に入り約10分
sen.e: Leave National Highway 27 near the Fukui Prefecture boundary and travel for approximately 10 minutes on the Matsuo-Kissaka route of Prefectural Road 564.
Leave National Highway 27 near the Fukui Prefecture boundary and travel for approximately 10 minutes on the Matsuo-Kissaka route of Prefectural Road 564.
Leave National Highway 27 near the boundary with Fukui Prefecture and travel for approximately 10 minutes on the Matsuo-Kissaka route of Prefectural Road 564.
sen.cmt: 「福井県との府県境」の表現を変えました。

sen.e: Neighboring Pilgrimage Sites
Neighboring Pilgrimage Sites

sen.j: 28 成相寺 -- 29 松尾寺 -- 30 長命寺
sen.e: 28. Nariai-dera Temple; 29. Matsunoo-dera Temple; 30. Chomei-ji Temple
28. Nariai-dera Temple; 29. Matsunoo-dera Temple; 30. Chomei-ji Temple
